explanation: [0-0] Against a blue and red gradient background, an aloe vera plant with cartoon eyes and a mouth is standing.

[0-7] A hand wearing a pink glove slowly reaches towards the aloe vera plant with cartoon eyes and mouth. The fingers gently pinch the aloe vera and pull it out of the pot. The background changes to yellow, and the pulled-out aloe vera leaf lies there. Then, a hand wearing a pink glove picks up a marker and draws a square on the leaf. Next, it picks up tweezers and clamps the area within the drawn square. Then, another hand wearing a pink glove picks up a gold chain from inside the aloe vera.

[7-11] The scene then switches to a girl with pink hair and pink clothes. She is looking at the gold chain in her hand in surprise. The girl stops her surprised expression, stuffs the gold chain into her clothes, and then picks up a banana with a cartoon pattern on it. There is a rectangular portion cut out of the banana. The girl removes the rectangular part of the banana, revealing the flesh inside.
